channel.title: TeamTorva Issues
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I am using a TeamTorva/Torvapkz source and I've tried to put it online, it lets me go online everytime but it won't let any other players on, what can I do to fix this problem? I tried portfowarding and I did it correctly (I think), but in the portforwarding, theres a port i've never seen before, there's the usual Startport Endport, but then there's a Hostpost and I have no idea what that is or what I should put in there. I put 43594 in the start and end port like I am supposed to, and I have everything correct in my exceptions in my firewall. What can or what do I do to fix this problem so I can get get on the server? The message they get is "Error Connecting to Server" every time.
All help is appreciated, thank you!(:

item.title: TeamTorva Issues
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Find server.java and change the connection to your host

Read full topic

item.title: TeamTorva Issues

item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

Yeah, I changed everything to my No-IP thing.

Bump

Read full topic

item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

Did u make ur client ip that players download what your no-ip is?
